io.konik.zugferd.entity

Class AllowanceCharge

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.konik.zugferd.entity.AllowanceCharge

  • public class AllowanceCharge
extends Object

    The Allowance Charge

    Represents trade surcharges and discounts as well as a reason.
